thread.title: What TV channel, time is the LSU vs. Western Kentucky game on tonight?
thread.title_full: What TV channel, time is the LSU vs. Western Kentucky game on tonight? | NOLA.com

author: Julie Boudwin, NOLA.com | The Times-Picayune
title: What TV channel, time is the LSU vs. Western Kentucky game on tonight?
text:
The No. 5-ranked LSU Tigers are in Baton Rouge Saturday against the 6-1 Western Kentucky Hilltoppers at 6 p.m. CT in Tiger Stadium.
The game will be televised on ESPNU.
If you're looking to catch the game and a drink you can use NOLA.com | The Times-Picayune's go-to bar guide to find the perfect spot in the New Orleans area.
Tigers (6-0) vs. Hilltoppers (6-1) game info:
What channel? ESPNU
What time? 6 p.m. CT
What day? Saturday
How to watch online/stream live? WatchESPN
Radio station? WWL Radio 870 AM/105.3 FM in New Orleans, WDGL-FM 98.1 in Baton Rouge and Sirius ch. 86, XM ch. 86 (See complete list of stations from around the state HERE )
